job.title: Software Engineer - Photos
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brDo you have a passion for building the best photo app experience in the worldbrbriPhone is the most popular camera in the world Seamless integration of software and hardware has delivered magical experiences like Photos Memories and Portrait Mode The Camera amp Photos team leverages privacyrespecting machine learning technologies to ship emotional experiences to hundreds of millions of users worldwidebrbrWe are looking for an exceptional software engineer to develop innovative applications and infrastructure for the next generation of deeply personal products we deliver If you thrive on problems at the intersection of algorithms applied machine learning and backend engineering this position will excite and inspire youbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong br Excellent analytical problem solving and communication skills  Experience with Apple system level APIs and frameworksbrbr ObjectiveC  Swiftbrbr Asynchronous programmingbrbr Excellent algorithmic backgroundbrbr Applied Artificial Intelligence savvy Data Mining  Machine Learning  Knowledge Graph experience desirablebrbr Ability and desire to learn new skills and take on new tasksbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brThe role includes but is not limited tobrbr Analyzing researching and evaluating algorithmic models for Photos features related to Photos For You Memories Search and Peoplebrbr Prototyping designing developing and shipping new personalized experiencesbrbr Working crossfunctionally to connect knowledge across the platform and create intelligent customerfacing featuresbrbr Performing quality assurance and testing of the developed routines and applicationsbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBS  MS in Computer Science or equivalent experiencebrbr brRole Number 200126510brbr
